Posts.Content: Suzyshacklechick wrote: I have ILC and have surgery December 27th. But I feel bad ruining holidays for friends telling them about me. But I could use the support. Who should I tell? Dx 11/2/2018, ILC, Left, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- (IHC) Surgery 12/27/2018 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Hormonal Therapy 2/18/2019 Arimidex (anastrozole) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Who do I tell? Suzyshacklechick AliceBastable
